Class GameSettings

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.utils.GameSettings
public class GameSettings extends Object
A utility class that holds global game settings for the application. This class provides a centralized place to manage and modify settings that affect the behavior or appearance of the game.

Currently, it contains a single boolean flag to control whether hitboxes should be displayed during gameplay.

    SHOW_HITBOXES

  • Field Details

    • SHOW_HITBOXES

      public static boolean SHOW_HITBOXES
      A boolean flag indicating whether to show hitboxes for game entities.

      - If set to true, hitboxes for all game entities (e.g., players, enemies, projectiles) will be rendered on the screen. This is typically useful for debugging purposes to visualize collision areas. - If set to false, hitboxes will not be displayed.

      Default value: false.
